Using bun as package manager.

Ensure adherence to best practices in code quality, performance, and security.

The backend is built with Node.js and Express.js, using PostgreSQL as the database. It includes features for user authentication, event management, registrations, image uploads, health checks, and notifications.

The codebase follows RESTful API design principles and includes comprehensive error handling and input validation.
